# Configuration Options[Â¶](#configuration-options "Permanent link")

This section lists the most common options for running vLLM.

There are three main levels of configuration, from highest priority to lowest priority:

-   [Request parameters](../serving/openai_compatible_server/#completions-api) and [input arguments](../api/#inference-parameters)
-   [Engine arguments](engine_args/)
-   [Environment variables](env_vars/)
